artist: Engraver: Benedetto Eredi; Painter: After Ottavio Leoni
description: half length portrait of man facing right looking slightly right; curly collar length hair; white lace edge collar
inscription:
Signature,Title, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [GIO: FRANCESCO BARBIERI/ DIO IL GUERCINO DA CENTO/ Ott. Leoni f. H. del.  Ben. Eredi fe.];  on sheet in pencil: [1-508]; on verso in brown: [a hand written paragraph of biographical information]
title: Portrait of Giovanni Francisco Barbieri
